textBox.richText: Time for some South Park. After a day of seeing strange behaving as if it is normal, it is refreshing to see normal behaving as if it is strange. It makes me feel so human in a good way. This dichotemy is why I love irony. Lady Gaga also has that appeal for me. Maybe that is why she has reached such mainstream popularity even though on the surface her persona seems so unusual. Now what would really be healing is some disco stick... I kid ;)
